Kelston Girls’ College goes into lockdown: West Auckland school does ‘controlled release’ of students https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kelston-girls-college-goes-into-lockdown-west-auckland-school-does-control-release-of-students/Z73FL23XJVBKRN5VZTKWFWOZQM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kelston-girls-college-goes-into-lockdown-west-auckland-school-does-control-release-of-students/Z73FL23XJVBKRN5VZTKWFWOZQM/ The school warned: 'Do not come to the school or phone' lest it risk students safety.
